org.myrobotlab.mapper.sim
Class Agent

java.lang.Object
  org.myrobotlab.mapper.sim.BaseObject
      org.myrobotlab.mapper.sim.SimpleAgent
          org.myrobotlab.mapper.sim.Agent
Direct Known Subclasses:
AvoidersDemo.Robot, BaseDemo.Robot, BlinkingLampDemo.Robot, BumpersDemo.Robot, DifferentialKinematicDemo.Robot, KheperaRobot, PickCherriesDemo.Robot, PushBallsDemo.Robot, Robot, SimplestDemo.Robot, SingleAvoiderDemo.Robot, SLAMBad.MyRobot, TestSimbatch.MyRobot
public class Agent
extends SimpleAgent

This is the base class for all robot and is considered to be a heavy agent.
When deriving a new robot's class from this class, one should override the following methods:

  • initBehavior : called by the simulator to initialize the controler.
  • performBehavior : called by the simulator on each simulation step.
* Implementation note : the agent doesnt have synchronized methods. All thread refering to the agent should do explicit synchronization with synchronized(agent){...}.
